breathing_exercises.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
breathing_exercises.description: Inhale for 4, hold for 7, exhale for 8

breathing_exercises.name: Box Breathing
breathing_exercises.description: Equal count breathing in a square pattern

music_suggestions.title: Peaceful Piano
music_suggestions.description: Gentle piano melodies for deep relaxation

music_suggestions.title: Ocean Waves
music_suggestions.description: Natural ocean sounds to wash away stress

music_suggestions.title: Forest Rain
music_suggestions.description: Gentle rainfall in a serene forest setting

music_suggestions.title: Meditation Bell
music_suggestions.description: Traditional meditation bells for mindfulness practice

music_suggestions.title: Soft Jazz
music_suggestions.description: Mellow jazz instrumentals for evening relaxation

music_suggestions.title: Alpine Breeze
music_suggestions.description: Cool mountain air and gentle breezes

journal_prompts.prompt: What are three things you're grateful for today?
Describe a challenge you faced recently and how you overcame it.
What does your ideal day look like? Write it in detail.
How are you feeling right now? Explore these emotions without judgment.
Write about a person who has positively influenced your life.

mindfulness_activities.name: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
mindfulness_activities.description: Notice 5 things you see, 4 you hear, 3 you touch, 2 you smell, 1 you taste

mindfulness_activities.name: Body Scan
instructions: End at the top of your head

mindfulness_activities.name: Loving Kindness
mindfulness_activities.description: Send positive thoughts to yourself and others
instructions: Start with yourself: 'May I be happy'

wellness_tips.tip: Take regular breaks from screens to rest your eyes and mind
Practice deep breathing for 2 minutes when feeling overwhelmed
Keep a gratitude journal to focus on positive aspects of life
Establish a consistent sleep schedule for better mental clarity
Connect with nature regularly to reduce stress and improve mood
